title: Emails
text: I'm not sure if this is the proper topic under which to post this question, but, here goes; for years, since I've been a subscriber to M* I've received emails to which I have subscribed (e.g., Fund Spy, Daily, Portfolio Update, etc.). However, over the past several weeks I have not received anything. So, on August 21 I submitted a case to retail support...no answer, followed up on the 25th and received the following message the next day: "I would like to inform you that this is a known issue and we are already working towards resolving it. I will notify you once the issue will be resolved." Huh? What is going on with this service, a basic offering like email?
